name: Clay Figure
description: Allows you to summon villagers and blazes by crafting figures and placing them.
extendedDescription:
This mod allows you to summon villagers by sculpting **clay figures**, firing them, and then placing the fired figures. You are also able to craft **golden blaze statues** to summon blazes.

The unfired figures are crafted using clay, and firing the figures takes about one minute in a blast furnace.

>Important note: the firing only works in a blast furnace.

Upon right click on a block with at least two non-solid blocks above it, the figure will be placed and spawn the mob.
